name: Recovery (Jesús Mastache Caballero)
description:
Heal a cute monster in need in this dreamy, space-like platformer game. Sing to heal spikes wounding the monster, do it before the night ends, you gravitate towards the monster and some obstacles.

Credits:

  • Concept art: Irma León
  • llustrations: Irma León
  • 3D Modeling: Amir Bayareh
  • UI art: Amir Bayareh
  • Animations: Carlos Calderón
  • Programming: Jesús Mastache
  • Game and level design: Carlos Bárcena
  • Music: "Vocalise" by Sergei Rachmaninov
  • "Rhapsody on a theme by Paganini" by Sergei Rachmaninov
  • Music instrumentalization: Carlos Bárcena
  • SFX: Pond5, Freesound.org, Kikiwiki, Carlos Bárcena
